code: import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{URL}from'../../config';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import axios from'axios';var DeleteUser=function DeleteUser(){var navigate=useNavigate();var _useLocation=useLocation(),state=_useLocation.state;var deleteUserById=function deleteUserById(){var id=state.id;var url="".concat(URL,"/user/delete/").concat(id);axios.delete(url).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result['status']=='success'){toast.success("User deleted Successfully");navigate('/user');}else{toast.error("User not deleted");}});};useEffect(function(){deleteUserById();},[]);};export default DeleteUser;
